src:
KLB PSSI Pilih Ketua Baru Sabtu Hari Ini, Simak Agenda Acaranya
01 Nov 2019, 22:31 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Persatuan Sepak Bola Seluruh Indonesia atau PSSI akan menggelar Kongres Luar Biasa (KLB) pada Sabtu, 2 November 2019 di Hotel Shangri-La, Jakarta. Kongres digelar untuk memilih Ketua Umum, Wakil Ketua Umum, dan anggota Komite Eksekutif (Exco).
Kongres dijadwalkan dihadiri Menteri Pemuda dan Olahraga Zainudin Amali dan Ketua Komite Olahraga Nasional Indonesia (KONI) Pusat, Marciano Norman. Keduanya dijadwalkan memberi sambutan sebelum kongres pemilihan dimulai.
KLB akan mulai berlangsung pada pukul 09.30 WIB. Komite Pemilihan mengagendakan sesi awal untuk memilih ketua umum PSSI. Kemudian agenda berlanjut ke pemilihan wakil ketua umum, dan terakhir memilih anggota Komite Eksekutif (Exco).
Total ada 11 calon ketua umum PSSI. Mereka adalah Arif Putra Wicaksono, Aven Hinelo, Benhard Limbong, Benny Erwin, Fary Djemi Francis. Lalu ada La Nyalla Mattalitti, Mochamad Iriawan, Rahim Soekasah, Sarman El Hakim, Vijaya Fitriyasa, dan Yesayas Oktavianus.

Berikut Agenda KLB PSSI Sabtu, 2 November 2019


Registrasi

08.00-09.00 WIB: Registrasi Peserta dan Calon

Pembukaan

09.00-09.30 WIB: Menyanyikan Lagu Indonesia Raya
Menyanyikan Mars PSSI
Pembacaan Doa
Sambutan Ketua KONI
Sambutan Menpora RI

Kongres Luar Biasa Pemilihan

09.30 WIB-selesai: Roll Call
- Pernyataan Kongres telah sesuai dengan Statuta PSSI
- Pidato Pembukaan oleh Plt Ketua Umum PSSI
- Penyampaian Tata Tertib Kongres Luar Biasa Pemilihan PSSI 2019
- Penunjukan Petugas Pemeriksa Berita Acara
- Penyampaian Tata Cara Pemilihan
- Pemilihan Ketua Umum PSSI
- Pemilihan Wakil Ketua Umum PSSI
- Pemilihan Anggota Komite Eksekutif PSSI
- Penutupan Kongres
- Pidato Ketua Umum PSSI Terpilih Periode 2019-2023
- Pembacaan Doa.

IRSYAN HASYIM | PSSI
text:
PSSI KLB Selects New Chair Saturday Today, See The Event Agenda
01 Nov 2019, 22:31 by Tempo.co, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The All Indonesian Football Association or PSSI will hold an Extraordinary Congress (KLB) on Saturday, November 2, 2019 at the Shangri-La Hotel, Jakarta. Congress is held to elect the Chairperson, Deputy Chairperson, and members of the Executive Committee (Exco).
The congress is scheduled to be attended by the Minister of Youth and Sports Zainudin Amali and Chair of the Indonesian National Sports Committee (KONI), Marciano Norman. Both are scheduled to give a speech before the election congress begins.
KLB will start at 09.30 WIB. The Election Committee arranges an initial session to elect the PSSI general chair. Then the agenda goes to the election of vice chairman, and finally elects the members of the Executive Committee (Exco).
In total there are 11 PSSI general chairperson candidates. They are Arif Putra Wicaksono, Aven Hinelo, Benhard Limbong, Benny Erwin, Fary Djemi Francis. Then there are La Nyalla Mattalitti, Mochamad Iriawan, Rahim Soekasah, Sarman El Hakim, Vijaya Fitriyasa, and Yesayas Oktavianus.

Following the PSSI KLB Agenda Saturday, November 2, 2019


Registration

08.00-09.00 WIB: Registration of Participants and Candidates

Opening

09.00-09.30 WIB: Singing Indonesia Raya Song
Sing PSSI Mars
Chanting prayers
Message from Chairman KONI
Message from the Indonesian Minister of Youth and Sports

Extraordinary Congress for Elections

9:30 WIB - finished: Roll Call
- The Congress statement is in accordance with the PSSI Statutes
- Opening Speech by Acting Chairperson of PSSI
- Submission to the Standing Orders of the Extraordinary Congress of the 2019 PSSI Election
- Appointment of Officials Investigating Official Report
- Submission of Election Procedures
- Election of PSSI Chairperson
- Election of PSSI Deputy Chairperson
- Election of PSSI Executive Committee Members
- Closing Congress
- Speeches of the Elected PSSI Chairperson for the 2019-2023 Period
- Chanting prayers.

IRSYAN HASYIM | PSSI
